short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NewJeans Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD New Jeans background. NewJeans wallpaper background theme for Kpop fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Capabilities:

1. Each new tab greets you with a different NewJeans wallpaper.
2. Customize or randomize your NewJeans background from the wallpaper picker.
3. Utilize the integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your emails and social media profiles.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Features a Notepad for jotting down tasks and reminders.
7. Quick navigation to your frequently visited sites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarked pages.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite sites swiftly.
10. Immediate entry to Google's suite of applications.
11. Instantly explore additional theme options.
12. Share content effortlessly on social media platforms.
13. Download wallpapers directly from the new tab.
14. Instant links to engage in online gaming.
15. Activate interactive animations like snow, rain, autumn leaves, and fireworks on your NewJeans themed tab.
